text: Huillé-Lézigné is a commune in the Maine-et-Loire department in western France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Lézigné (the seat) and Huillé.Arrêté préfectoral 5 December 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Maine-et-Loire department ==References== Category:Communes of Maine-et-Loire
title: Huillé-Lézigné
